attributes.action: No VAR in any forms of English football leagues.
attributes.additional_details: Football is our national game and provides so many memories for all. The purity and drama is being ripped out.
attributes.background: VAR is killing our beautiful game and I would like the government to step in to save it!

rejection.details: This is a matter for football's governing bodies, including the Premier League, English Football League, and Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
